string-array.name: msd_pc_system_install_start_summary
string-array.item: For Windows XP or older versions,\nthe driver needs to be manually installed
For Windows Vista or newer versions,\nthe MI 3 music player will appear on your computer
For Mac OS operating system,\nthe driver software needs to be manually installed

string-array.name: msd_pc_system_install_step_2_summary
string-array.item: 2.MI 3 mobile storage device will appear on your computer\nYou can now transfer files
Computer will auto open and read phone data\nYou can now transfer files

string-array.name: msd_pc_system_install_finish_summary
string-array.item: If you install this driver\nMI 3 mobile storage device should appear on the computer
For Windows Vista or newer versions,\nthe MI 3 music player will appear on your computer
If you install this driver\nComputer will auto open and read phone data
